TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConventionAnnotatableBuilder

summary.para: Provides a simple API surface for configuring an from conventions.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.param: The name of the annotation to remove.
Indicates whether the configuration was specified using a data annotation.
Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether an annotation with the given name can be removed using this configuration source.
Docs.returns: true if the annotation can be removed, false otherwise.
